TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class DocumentBase : IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.ICachedDataPersistanceCallback, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.IDocumentExtension, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DocumentBase extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.EntryPoint, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.ICachedDataPersistanceCallback, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.IDocumentExtension, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 提供 Microsoft Office Word 文档级项目中 ThisDocument 类的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the ThisDocument class in document-level projects for Microsoft Office Word.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是适用于基`ThisDocument`在通过使用 Visual Studio 创建的文档级 Word 项目中的类。The class is the base class for the `ThisDocument` class in document-level Word projects created by using Visual Studio. 使用`ThisDocument`类来访问你的项目中的文档。Use the `ThisDocument` class to access the document in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). 类提供相同的成员Word 主互操作程序集，但前者的对象将添加以下功能：The class provides the same members as a object in the Word primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features: - 属性。 property. 将托管的控件添加到你的项目中的文档或从其中删除托管的代码，请使用此属性。Use this property to add managed controls to the document in your project, or to remove managed controls. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性添加到你的项目中的文档的智能标记。Use this property to add smart tags to the document in your project. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性来获取基础文档主机项的对象。Use this property to get the underlying object for the document host item. - 方法。 method. 使用此方法以从你的项目中的文档中删除自定义程序集。Use this method to remove the customization assembly from the document in your project. - 方法。 method. 重写此方法，如果你添加到你的项目通过使用多个自定义功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项模板，并且想要指定运行时在显示的功能区。Override this method if you added multiple custom Ribbons to your project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template, and you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. - 方法。 method. 重写此方法以公开的类向文档中的 VBA 代码项目中。Override this method to expose a class in your project to VBA code in the document. - 文档级事件，如和，仅在 Word 对象模型中的应用程序级别提供。Document-level events, such as and , that are provided only at the application level in the Word object model. 也就是说，在 Word 对象模型中，这些事件定义中类而不是类。That is, in the Word object model, these events are defined in the class rather than the class. ## 创建文档宿主项Creating Document Host Items 无法创建以编程方式在 Office 项目中的对象。You cannot create objects programmatically in Office projects. 在文档级项目中，`ThisDocument`类 (它派生自) 自动实例化[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]最终用户打开文档时。In document-level projects, the `ThisDocument` class (which derives from ) is instantiated automatically by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] when the end user opens the document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建以编程方式使用主机项`GetVstoObject`方法。In application-level projects, you can create host items programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net4utilities](~/includes/vsto-net4utilities-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当你将焦点移动应用程序中发生的事件。The event occurs only when you move the focus within an application. 将焦点移到或从另一个应用程序中的对象不会触发该事件。Moving the focus to or from an object in another application does not trigger the event. ## Examples 激活该文档时，下面的代码段将显示一条消息。The following code snippet displays a message when the document is activated. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文档没有活动的主题，此属性将返回"none"。This property returns "none" if the document does not have an active theme. 返回此属性的值的说明，请参阅`Name`参数方法。For an explanation of the value returned by this property, see the `Name` argument of the method. 返回此属性的值可能与主题的显示名称不对应。The value returned by this property might not correspond to the theme's display name. 若要返回主题的显示名称，使用属性。To return a theme's display name, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将对文档调用下午主题应用，然后显示一条消息，显示活动主题的名称。The following code example applies a theme called Afternoon to the document and then displays a message that shows the name of the active theme. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ApplyTheme(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 要应用的主题名称加上任何主题格式选项。

span.span: The name of the theme plus any theme formatting options you want to apply.

summary.span: 将主题应用到此文档（如果文档已打开）。

span.span: Applies a theme to a document, if the document is open.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式`name`字符串是"主题 nnn"其中主题和 nnn 定义的如下所示：The format of the `name` string is "theme nnn" where theme and nnn are defined as follows: 主题 – 包含请求的主题的数据的文件夹的名称。theme – The name of the folder that contains the data for the requested theme. （主题数据文件夹的默认位置是 C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Themes11。）你必须使用为该主题的文件夹名称而不是显示中的显示名称**主题**对话框。(The default location for theme data folders is C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Themes11.) You must use the folder name for the theme rather than the display name that appears in the **Theme** dialog box. nnn – 指示格式设置选项以激活 (若要激活，0，若要停用的 1) 的主题的三个数字字符串。nnn – A three-digit string that indicates which theme formatting options to activate (1 to activate, 0 to deactivate). 每个数字对应于**鲜艳****颜色**， **Active** **图形**，和**后台** **映像**中的复选框**主题**对话框。The digits correspond to the **Vivid** **Colors**, **Active** **Graphics**, and **Background** **Image** check boxes in the **Theme** dialog box. 如果省略此字符串，nnn 的默认值是"011"（活动图形和背景图像都被激活）。If this string is omitted, the default value for nnn is "011" (Active Graphics and Background Image are activated). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将"下午 011"主题应用于当前文档。The following code example uses the method to apply the "Afternoon 011" theme to the current document. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordDocument#43](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument/CS/ThisDocument.cs#43)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordDocument#43](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument/VB/ThisDocument.vb#43)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭文档之前发生该事件时。The event occurs before the document closes. 若要使文档无法关闭，设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量对象传递给`true`。To keep the document from closing, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided object to `true`. ## Examples 关闭文档之前，下面的代码示例显示一个消息框。The following code example displays a message box before the document closes. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止打印该文档，将设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量对象传递给`true`。To prevent the document from printing, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided object to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，询问你是否想要打印文档打印文档前。The following code example displays a message before the document is printed that asks whether you want to print the document. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止发生默认右键单击操作，将设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量对象传递给`true`。To prevent the default right-click action from occurring, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided object to `true`. ## Examples 右键单击文档时，下面的代码示例将显示一条消息。The following code example displays a message when you right-click the document. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. span.span: Puts a document on a server from a local computer, and sets the local document to read-only so that it cannot be edited locally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置`makePublic`参数`true`提交文档以供审批过程，并最终会导致具有对文档执行只读权限的用户发布的文档的版本 (仅适用于时`saveChanges`设置为`true`).Setting the `makePublic` parameter to `true` submits the document for the approval process, which can eventually result in a version of the document being published to users with read-only rights to the document (only applies if `saveChanges` is set to `true`). 若要利用内置于 Word 的协作功能，必须在 Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server 存储文档。To take advantage of the collaboration features built into Word, documents must be stored on a Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来确定该文档是否已存储在 Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server。The following code example uses the method to determine whether the document has been stored on a Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server. 如果已在服务器上存储的文档，然后该示例调用方法来检查在文档中，将更改保存到的服务器位置，然后提交审批过程的文档。If the document has been stored on a server, then the example calls the method to check in the document, save changes to the server location, and submit the document for the approval process. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameter. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Type`|之一指定要检查的兼容性选项的值。One of the values that specifies the compatibility option to check for.| 如果你使用未指定参数的属性，它返回不应在代码中直接使用的对象。If you use the property without specifying a parameter, it returns a object that is not intended to be used directly from your code. 兼容性选项会影响 Microsoft Office Word 文档的显示方式。Compatibility options affect how a document is displayed in Microsoft Office Word. 某些值可能不是提供给你，具体取决于的语言支持 （美国美式英语）。Some of the values might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中，如果段落位于之后硬分页符会取消段前的空间。The following code example suppresses the space before a paragraph if the paragraph is located after a hard page break. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 打开在早期版本的 Word 中创建的文档时，兼容性模式将打开。When you open a document that was created in a previous version of Word, Compatibility Mode is turned on. 兼容性模式可确保在处理文档时，[!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中没有新增或增强功能可用，以便使用早期版本的 Word 编辑文档的用户获得完全编辑功能。Compatibility Mode ensures that no new or enhanced features in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] are available while working with a document, so that people who edit the document using previous versions of Word will have full editing capabilities. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两种类型的数字： 预设数字 ()，这可以通过选择中的模板添加到段落**项目符号和编号**对话框; 和 LISTNUM 字段 ()，使您能够添加多个每个段落的一个数字。There are two types of numbers: preset numbers (), which you can add to paragraphs by selecting a template in the **Bullets and Numbering** dialog box; and LISTNUM fields (), which enable you to add more than one number per paragraph. 方法很有用，如果你想要使用另一个应用程序中的文档和列表格式或 LISTNUM 字段，该应用程序无法识别。The method is useful if you want to work with a document in another application and that application does not recognize list formatting or LISTNUM fields. 将列表数字转换为文本后，你无法再在列表中处理它们。After you convert list numbers to text, you can no longer manipulate them in a list. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将所有列表编号和 LISTNUM 转换字段到文本的文档中。The following code example uses the method to convert all list numbers and LISTNUM fields in the document to text. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当样式模板复制到文档时，文档中的名称类似的样式将重新定义为匹配的模板中描述的样式。When styles are copied from a template to a document, like-named styles in the document are redefined to match the style descriptions in the template. 模板中的唯一样式将复制到文档。Unique styles from the template are copied to the document. 在文档中的唯一样式保持不变。Unique styles in the document remain intact. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将从指定的模板的样式复制到当前文档。The following code example uses the method to copy the styles from the specified template to the current document. 此示例假定名为 Sales96.dot 的模板文件存在时在 C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Templates 计算机上。This example assumes that a template file named Sales96.dot exists on the computer at C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Templates. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法以返回的实现`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口。Override this method to return an implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface. 如果你的项目中有多个功能区，你可以指定运行时在显示的功能区。If you have multiple Ribbons in your project, you can specify which Ribbons to display at run time. 无需重写此方法以返回你使用添加到项目的功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项模板。You do not have to override this method to return Ribbons that you add to the project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template. 默认情况下，此方法返回对象，表示所有**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项目中的项。By default, this method returns a object that represents all **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items in the project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md). 必须重写或方法以返回你使用添加的项目中的功能区**功能区 (XML)** 项模板。You must override the or method to return Ribbons in your project that you add by using the **Ribbon (XML)** item template. 有关如何重写方法，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。For more information about how to override the method, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例替代`CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject`中的方法`ThisAddin`或`ThisDocument`的项目并返回想要显示的功能区类。The following code example overrides the `CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject` method in the `ThisAddin` or `ThisDocument` class of the project and returns the Ribbon that you want to display. 该示例需要将两个功能区添加到你的项目称为`Ribbon1`和`Ribbon2`使用**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项。The example requires that you add two Ribbons to your project called `Ribbon1` and `Ribbon2` by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item. 该示例将检查名为的字段的值`myCondition`并返回相应的功能区。The example checks the value of a field named `myCondition` and returns the appropriate Ribbon. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性属性是`true`，每次保存文档时，Word 将生成一个随机数字，该应用程序使用以方便进行比较和合并文档。If the property of the property is `true`, each time a document is saved, Word generates a random number that the application uses to facilitate comparing and merging documents. Word 表中存储的随机数，并在每次保存后更新表。Word stores the random numbers in a table and updates the table after each save. 属性返回的最后一个号分配给该文档该单词。The property returns the last number that Word assigned to the document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个消息框，显示的值属性。The following code example shows a message box that displays the value of the property. 该代码，然后将文本添加到第一个段落，保存文档，然后显示显示的修改后的值的第二个消息框属性。The code then adds text to the first paragraph, saves the document, and then shows a second message box that displays the modified value of the property. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 结果方法存储在基于字符的字符的属性。The results of the method are stored in the property on a character by character basis. 方法检查文档 （标头、 页脚、 文本框中，和等） 中的所有可用的文本。The method checks all available text in the document (headers, footers, text boxes, and so forth). 如果方法已应用到指定的文本，属性设置为`true`。If the method has already been applied to the specified text, the property is set to `true`. 若要重新评估指定的文本的语言，必须首先设置属性`false`。To re-evaluate the language of the specified text, you must first set the property to `false`.

summary.span: 以 PDF 或 XPS 格式保存文档。

span.span: Saves the document in PDF or XPS format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将保存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件从 Microsoft Office Word 仅后提供此功能的外接程序安装。You can save as a PDF or XPS file from Microsoft Office Word only after you install an add-in that provides this feature. 有关详细信息，搜索"启用支持对其他文件格式，例如 PDF 和 XPS"Office online。For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将当前的文档保存在具有指定名称的 PDF 格式。The following code example saves the current document in PDF format with the specified name. 因为未不指定任何文件夹，则 PDF 文件默认保存在用户的 My Documents 文件夹中。Because no folder is specified, the PDF file is saved in the user's My Documents folder by default. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. span.span: if the document is final; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为`true`，Microsoft Office Word 将标记为最终状态的文档，通知收件人，（如果有），该文档处于最终状态，并将文档设置为只读的。If you set this property to `true`, Microsoft Office Word marks the document as final, notifies recipients (if any) that the document is final, and sets the document to read-only. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索当前文档的属性。The following code example retrieves the property of the current document. 如果该文档不是已最终的代码将显示一条消息，通知用户文档不是最终版本，并随后设置属性`true`。If the document is not already final, the code shows a message that informs the user that the document is not final, and then sets the property to `true`. 在文档标记最终之前，Word 还显示一条消息。Word also displays a message before the document is marked final. 如果文档已最终，此代码将显示一条消息，告知用户文档已经是最终版本。If the document is already final, the code shows a message that informs the user that the document is already final. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. summary.span: 解析超链接，或者如果文档已经下载的话，则显示缓存的文档。

span.span: Resolves a hyperlink, or displays a cached document if the document has already been downloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会显示对缓存的文档位于`Address`参数，如果已下载。This method displays the cached document located at the `Address` parameter, if it has already been downloaded. 否则，此方法解析超链接，下载目标文档并在适当的应用程序中显示此文档。Otherwise, this method resolves the hyperlink, downloads the target document, and displays the document in the appropriate application. 如果超链接使用文件协议，此方法将打开的文档而不是下载它。If the hyperlink uses the file protocol, this method opens the document instead of downloading it. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以在新窗口中显示网页。The following code example uses the method to display a Web page in a new window. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于**隐藏内置名称存在替换名称时**中的复选框**样式窗格选项**对话框。This property corresponds to the **Hide built-in name when alternate name exists** check box in the **Style Pane Options** dialog box. 设置属性`true`时备用用户定义的样式存在隐藏内置样式。Setting the property to `true` hides built-in styles when alternate user-defined styles exist. 例如，如果用户具有相同名称作为内置样式创建标题样式，则用户定义的样式优先，内置的样式的样式名称的列表中不会显示。For example, if a user creates a heading style with the same name as a built-in style, the user-defined style takes precedence and the built-in style is not shown in the list of style names.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在公式跨越两行或更多行时 Microsoft Office Word 放置二元运算符的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies where Microsoft Office Word places binary operators when equations span two or more lines.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式时将在一个二元运算符处中断 — 例如，加法、 减法或乘法运算符 — 有三个不同的运算符的放置方式： 换行符之前、 之后、 在换行，并且重复之前和之后中断。When the equation breaks on a binary operator—for example, an addition, subtraction, or multiplication operator—there are three different placements of the operator: before the break, after the break, and repeated both before and after the break. 当此属性设置为，使用属性来指定如何 Word 将出现在行中断之前的减法运算符。When this property is set to , use the property to specify how Word treats subtraction operators that appear before a line break. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性的值，以使二元运算符公式换到重复的新行的开头。The following code example sets the property to a value that causes the binary operator that the equation breaks on to repeat at the beginning of the new line. 此外，该代码将设置属性将两个减法运算符的序列转换为的加运算符序列的值后跟一个减号运算符。In addition, the code sets the property to a value that converts the sequence of two subtraction operators to a sequence of a plus operator followed by a minus operator. 这可以防止两个负值正在创建时属性设置为，用于重复减法运算符在公式换行。This prevents double negatives from being created when the property is set to , which repeats the subtraction operator at the equation break. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordDocument_Additional#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument_Additional/CS/ThisDocument.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordDocument_Additional#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument_Additional/VB/ThisDocument.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 Microsoft Office Word 如何处理位于换行符之前的减法运算符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how Microsoft Office Word handles a subtraction operator that falls before a line break.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性仅当属性设置为。This property is used only when the property is set to . 换行符落在减法运算符上和文档设置为重复减法运算符上的以下行，因为两个减号得正时，有时减法接收特殊处理。Subtraction sometimes receives special treatment when a line break falls on a subtraction operator and the document setting is to repeat the subtraction operator on the following line, because two negatives make a positive. 某些编写器选择一个减号转换加号，而某些选择保留两个减号。Some writers choose to convert one of the minus signs into a plus sign, and some choose to keep the two negatives. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性的值，以使二元运算符公式换到重复的新行的开头。The following code example sets the property to a value that causes the binary operator that the equation breaks on to repeat at the beginning of the new line. 此外，该代码将设置属性将两个减法运算符的序列转换为的加运算符序列的值后跟一个减号运算符。In addition, the code sets the property to a value that converts the sequence of two subtraction operators to a sequence of a plus operator followed by a minus operator. 这可以防止两个负值正在创建时属性设置为，用于重复减法运算符在公式换行。This prevents double negatives from being created when the property is set to , which repeats the subtraction operator at the equation break. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordDocument_Additional#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument_Additional/CS/ThisDocument.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordDocument_Additional#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument_Additional/VB/ThisDocument.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要执行精确比较文档的比较操作，使用`CompareDocuments`方法属性。To perform a legal-blackline document compare operation, use the `CompareDocuments` method of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将在文档级自定义项 （称为原始文档） 与同一文档 （称为修订过的文档） 的另一个版本的 Word 文档进行比较。The following code example compares the Word document in the document-level customization (called the original document) with another version of the same document (called the revised document). 它将比较的结果放到原始文档中。It places the result of the comparison into the original document. 该示例然后通知用户，无论原始文档的标题和修改后的文档的标题是相同还是不同，显示这两个文档标题。The example then notifies the user whether the title of the original document and the title of the revised document are identical or different and displays both document titles. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果保护文档，则用户可以进行有限的更改，如添加批注、 进行修订，或者完成窗体。When a document is protected, users can make only limited changes, such as adding annotations, making revisions, or completing a form. 如果已受保护文档，在使用此方法时，将引发异常。If the document is already protected when you use this method, an exception is thrown. 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications. 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以允许用户添加到文档仅注释。The following code example uses the method to allow users to add only comments to the document. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. summary.span: 提供在缓存数据已保存后对文档重新应用密码保护的机会。

span.span: Provides you with an opportunity to reapply password protection to the document after the cached data has been saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法在文档级项目中的 Word 文档受密码保护，并且它包含可能在运行时更改的缓存的数据。Override this method in a document-level project for Word if your document is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time. 在你实现此方法中，使用方法保护的文档。In your implementation of this method, use the method to protect the document . 默认情况下，对受密码保护的文档中的缓存数据的更改不会保留在保存文档时。By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected document are not persisted when the document is saved. 若要将更改保存到缓存的数据，必须在你的项目中重写以下方法：To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project: - 。. 保存文档后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。When the document is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法的暂时取消保护文档。Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the document. 这使对缓存的数据要保存更改。This enables changes to the cached data to be saved. - 。. 保存文档后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。After the document is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法的重新应用到文档的保护。Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Password-Protected 文档中缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md)。For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用方法，即使由于无关密码保护某些错误，无法保存缓存的数据。The [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls the method even if the cached data could not be saved because of some error that is unrelated to the password protection. 例如，如果你实现接口可自定义缓存的数据的方式存储在文档中，调用方法即使你实现引发了异常，防止保存缓存的数据。For example, if you implement the interface to customize how cached data is stored in the document, the method is called even if your implementation throws an exception that prevents the cached data from being saved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以重新应用已通过重写中删除的保护方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to reapply protection that was removed by overriding the method. 该代码假定该密码存储在名为的字段中`securelyStoredPassword`。The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以通过执行以下任务来删除自定义项：This method removes the customization by performing the following tasks: - 它将删除`_AssemblyName`和`_AssemblyLocation`从文档的自定义属性。It deletes the `_AssemblyName` and `_AssemblyLocation` custom properties from the document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义文档属性概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md)。For more information, see [Custom Document Properties Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md). - 它从文档中删除缓存的数据。It deletes the cached data from the document. 有关缓存数据的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。For more information about cached data, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md). 此方法可能引发如果受保护文档。This method might throw an if the document is protected. 应调用此方法之前从文档中删除任何保护。You should remove any protection from the document before calling this method.

summary.span: 将电子邮件发送给已发出进行审阅的文档的作者，向作者通知审阅者已完成对该文档的审阅。

span.span: Sends an e-mail message to the author of a document that has been sent out for review, notifying him or her that a reviewer has completed review of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以启动文档协作审阅。Use the method to start a collaborative review of a document. 如果方法执行不协作审阅循环的一部分的文档，将引发异常。If the method is executed on a document that is not part of a collaborative review cycle, an exception is thrown. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以通知作者，查看文档，而不先显示对发送方的消息。The following code example uses the method to notify the author that the document has been reviewed, without displaying the message to the sender first. 此示例假定当前文档是协作审阅循环的一部分。This example assumes that the current document is part of a collaborative review cycle. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你通过自定义文档的功能区创建您自己的实现重写此方法接口或通过添加**功能区 (XML)** 到你的项目的项。Override this method if you are customizing the Ribbon of the document by creating your own implementation of the interface or by adding a **Ribbon (XML)** item to your project. 如果通过添加自定义功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项到你的项目，Visual Studio 重写此方法为你。If you customize the Ribbon by adding a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to your project, Visual Studio overrides this method for you. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)和[功能区设计器](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md) and [Ribbon Designer](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md). 如果你重写此方法，请检查的值`serviceGuid`参数，以确定是否`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口正在请求、，然后返回实现该接口的对象。If you override this method, check the value of the `serviceGuid` parameter to determine whether the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface is being requested, and then return an object that implements the interface. 当打开文档时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用，然后它将返回的值发送到 Microsoft Office Word。When your document is opened, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls , and it sends the return value to Microsoft Office Word. 有关详细信息`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口，请参阅[IRibbonExtensibility 对象](HV10096517)Microsoft Office 文档中。For more information about the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface, see [IRibbonExtensibility Object](HV10096517) in the Microsoft Office documentation. 或者可以重写方法而非重写方法。You can alternatively override the method instead of overriding the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md). > [!NOTE] > `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` 是多个接口 (也名为*扩展性接口*) 提供的 Microsoft Office。`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` is one of several interfaces (also named *extensibility interfaces*) that are provided by Microsoft Office. 但是，这是可以在 Word 文档级自定义项中实现的唯一接口。However, this is the only interface that you can implement in a document-level customization for Word. 在应用程序级外接程序，可以实现其他扩展性接口。有关详细信息，请参阅[UI 功能通过使用扩展性接口自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。You can implement other extensibility interfaces in application-level add-ins. For more information, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).

summary.span: 将文档发送给传真服务提供程序，该提供程序会将文档传真给指定的一个或多个收件人。

span.span: Sends the document to a fax service provider, who faxes the document to one or more specified recipients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法需要用户的计算机上启用了传真服务。Using this method requires that a fax service is enabled on a user's computer. 如果传真服务未启用，方法引发异常。If a fax service is not enabled, the method throws an exception. 用于指定中的传真号码的格式`Recipients`参数可以是* recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider *或* recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber *。The format used for specifying fax numbers in the `Recipients` parameter is either *recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider* or *recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber*. 您可以访问用户的传真提供程序信息使用以下注册表路径：You can access the user's fax provider information using the following registry path: `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\11.0\Common\Services\Fax` 使用`FaxAddress`键值在此注册表位置来确定要使用用户的格式。Use the `FaxAddress` key value at this registry location to determine the format to use for a user. 如果此注册表项不存在，则传真服务不可用。If this registry entry does not exist, no fax service is available. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将传真发送到使用格式的传真号码的文档* recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider *。The following code example uses the method to fax the document to a fax number using the format *recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider*. 代码将显示在发送传真之前的文档。The code displays the document before sending the fax. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordDocument#11](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument/CS/ThisDocument.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordDocument#11](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument/VB/ThisDocument.vb#11)]

summary.span: 以电子邮件形式发送文档，以便供指定的收件人审阅。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会启动协作审阅周期。This method starts a collaborative review cycle. 使用方法来结束审阅循环。Use the method to end a review cycle. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来为完整的电子邮件地址作为附件发送文档。The following code example uses the method to send the document to a full e-mail address as an attachment. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCompatibilityMode(int32 mode) cil managed

param.name: mode
param.span: 一个 值，指定在打开文档时 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 使用的兼容性模式。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the compatibility mode that [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] uses when opening the document.

summary.span: 设置文档的兼容性模式。

span.span: Sets the compatibility mode for the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中打开使用早期版本的 Word 创建的文档时，兼容性模式将打开。When you open a document in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] that was created in a previous version of Word, Compatibility Mode is turned on. 兼容性模式可确保在处理文档时，[!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中没有新增或增强功能可用，以便使用早期版本的 Word 编辑文档的用户获得完全编辑功能。Compatibility Mode ensures that no new or enhanced features in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] are available while working with a document, so that people who edit the document using previous versions of Word will have full editing capabilities. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.

exception.span: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此方法。

span.span: This method is used in a Word 2007 project.

span.span: Sets the options Microsoft Office Word uses for encrypting documents with passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了增强安全性，不要使用弱加密 (XOR) （也称为"OfficeXor"） 或"Office97/2000年兼容"（也称为"OfficeStandard"） 的算法。For enhanced security, do not use Weak Encryption (XOR) (also called "OfficeXor") or "Office97/2000 Compatible" (also called "OfficeStandard") algorithms. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来使用 RC4 加密算法。The following code example uses the method to use the RC4 encryption algorithm. 该代码指定密钥长度为 56、 启用文件属性加密，并将加密提供程序的名称设置为字符串`"Microsoft RSA SChannel Cryptographic Provider"`。The code specifies a key length of 56, enables file property encryption, and sets the name of the encryption provider to the string `"Microsoft RSA SChannel Cryptographic Provider"`. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合可以包含绘图、 形状、 图片、 OLE 对象、 ActiveX 控件、 文本对象和标注。This collection can contain drawings, shapes, pictures, OLE objects, ActiveX controls, text objects, and callouts. 属性，当应用于一个文档，返回所有文档，不包括页眉和页脚的正文中的对象。The property, when applied to a document, returns all the objects in the main story of the document, excluding the headers and footers. 当应用于对象，属性返回所有所有标头和文档的页脚中找到对象。When applied to a object, the property returns all the objects found in all the headers and footers in the document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到文档的左上角的形状。The following code example adds a shape to the upper left-hand corner of the document. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是你的项目中的文档主机项卸载时引发的最后一个事件。This is the last event that is raised when the document host item in your project unloads. 此事件用于任何其他清理过程。Use this event for any additional clean up. 当文档主机项关闭时，将卸载程序集的应用程序域。The application domain for the assembly unloads when the document host item shuts down. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新显示一条消息，显示文档正在关闭的事件处理程序。The following code example adds a new event handler that displays a message that shows that the document is shutting down. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. CryptoAPI 是使用 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4.01 安装和更高版本。The CryptoAPI is installed with Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 and higher. 你可以从证书颁发机构获取数字签名证书。You can obtain a digital signature certificate from a certification authority. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示**签名**对话框中，使用该对话框可以向文档添加数字签名。The following code example displays the **Signatures** dialog box, with which you can add a digital signature to the document. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. param.name: password
param.span: 要用来保护文档的密码。

span.span: The password used to protect the document.

param.span: 密码区分大小写。

span.span: Passwords are case-sensitive.

param.span: 如果文档受密码保护而且用户没有提供正确的密码，则会显示一个对话框，提示用户输入正确的密码。

span.span: If the document is protected with a password and the correct password is not supplied, a dialog box prompts the user for the password.

summary.span: 从文档中移除保护功能。

span.span: Removes protection from the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications. 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code. 如果未受保护文档，将引发异常。If the document is not protected, an exception is thrown. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以从文档中删除保护。The following code example uses the method to remove protection from the document. 该示例假定在密码变量`securelyStoredPassword`通过用户输入。The example assumes that the password variable `securelyStoredPassword` was obtained from user input. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void UnprotectDocument() cil managed

summary.span: 使用户有机会从文档移除密码保护并能保存缓存数据。

span.span: Provides you with an opportunity to remove password protection from the document and enable cached data to be saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法在文档级项目中的 Word 文档受密码保护，并且它包含可能在运行时更改的缓存的数据。Override this method in a document-level project for Word if your document is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time. 在你实现此方法中，使用方法暂时取消保护文档。In your implementation of this method, use the method to temporarily unprotect the document. 默认情况下，对受密码保护的文档中的缓存数据的更改不会保留在保存文档时。By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected document are not persisted when the document is saved. 若要将更改保存到缓存的数据，必须在你的项目中重写以下方法：To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project: - 。. 保存文档后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。When the document is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法的暂时取消保护文档。Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the document. 这使对缓存的数据要保存更改。This enables changes to the cached data to be saved. - 。. 保存文档后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。After the document is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法的重新应用到文档的保护。Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Password-Protected 文档中缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md)。For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法暂时取消保护文档，以便可以保存到缓存的数据的更改。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to temporarily unprotect the document so that changes to the cached data can be saved. 该示例首先将保存当前值，以便可以更高版本中重新应用相同类型的保护方法。The example first saves the current value, so that the same type of protection can be reapplied later in the method. 该代码假定该密码存储在名为的字段中`securelyStoredPassword`。The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. summary.span: 获取一个 集合，该集合表示文档中有验证错误的所有节点。

span.span: Gets a collection that represents all nodes in the document that have validation errors.

value.span: 一个 集合，表示文档中有验证错误的所有节点。

span.span: A collection that represents all nodes in the document that have validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例在为一个字符串，文档中设置的根元素的每个子节点的值，然后显示具有验证错误的节点的名称。The following code example sets the value of each child node of the root element in the document to a string, and then displays the names of the nodes that have validation errors. 例如，映射到具有整数类型的架构元素的任何节点将报告冲突错误。For example, any node that maps to a schema element with an integer type will report a violation error. 若要使用此示例中，运行从`ThisDocument`文档级项目中的类。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordDocument#203](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument/CS/ThisDocument.cs#203)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordDocument#203](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument/VB/ThisDocument.vb#203)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示错误消息文本是从内置的 Microsoft Office Word 错误消息生成，还是从包含在 Office 中的 Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) 5.0 组件生成。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether error message text is generated from the built-in Microsoft Office Word error messages or from the Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) 5.0 component included with Office.

value.span: 如果错误信息文本是从 MSXML 5.0 组件生成的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if error message text is generated from the MSXML 5.0 component; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用从 MSXML 5.0 组件的高级的错误消息提供更具体的错误消息。Using advanced error messages from the MSXML 5.0 component provides more specific error messages. 有大约 500 错误消息都可以访问 XML Core Services 通过提供属性是`true`。There are approximately 500 error messages provided through the XML Core Services that are accessible when the property is `true`. Word 有大约 50 个内置的常规架构错误。Word has approximately 50 built-in generic schema errors. 当属性是`false`，Word 将内置的错误消息用于在 XML 文档中生成的错误。When the property is `false`, Word uses the built-in error messages for errors generated in XML documents.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否通过可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 来保存文档。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to save a document through an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT).

value.span: 如果文档是通过 XSLT 保存的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the document is saved through an XSLT; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置时属性`true`，使用属性来指定要使用的 XSLT 路径和文件名。When setting the property to `true`, use the property to specify the path and file name of the XSLT to use.
